original_text: And he said to them, “Pay attention to what you hear: with the measure you use, it will be measured to you, and still more will be added to you.
korean_text: 또 이르시되 너희가 무엇을 듣는가 스스로 삼가라 너희의 헤아리는 그 헤아림으로 너희가 헤아림을 받을 것이며 더 받으리니

sentences.original_text: Pay attention to what you hear
it will be measured to you
and still more will be added to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 더 많은 것이 너희에게 더해질 것이다
